oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dug relics from Morgan County, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This collection of dug relics were recovered from the area around Montgomery, Morgan County, Tenn. The items inlcude minie balls, buckshot, flints, percussion caps, a gun tool for a revolver, a "worm" and a Burnside casing. Several skirmishes were reported in the area.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: Tools and equipment; Weapons and ammunition
